experience: 4 years of experience leading digital transformation initiatives for corporations such as MTEX, POPS, and BIN. 6 years of experience in cross-functional management with Spiral and Agile methodologies. Over 15 years of extensive experience in enterprise system design and software architecture. Roles include: Project Manager - System Design at BIN Corporation (2024-Now), Product Manager - CTO at CodeBox Solution (2019-2024), Scrum Master - Software Architect at LOCKON (EC-CUBE) (2015-2018), Consultant - Principal at YouNet (2013-2015), Platform Developer at POPS Media (2007-2012), and PHP Developer at Global Cybersoft (2005-2007). Experience covers managing business operations (Sales, Marketing, SEO), CRM/ERP integration, affiliate marketing, e-commerce, Web3 projects (Binance, Solana smart contracts), designing software architecture and system solutions, optimizing open-source e-commerce solutions, performance improvement, AWS optimization, building social and music platforms, and working with CMMI level 4.
certifications: Information System Bachelor (University of Science - KHTN HCM)
